ComicInfo.Title: Born Again part one: With Eyes Closed
ComicInfo.Summary: This is a prequel to the “BLOOD OF APOCALYPSE” arc running in X-Men #182-186!Cable sees the signs--omens and portents--characters gathering, moving across the board like chess pieces... can APOCALYPSE be resurrected? Can Cable and Deadpool stop it in time? And most surprising of all... what if one of them doesn’t want it to be stopped? X-citement! X-Thrills! X-over = higher sales! Makes Deadpool happy!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 14:58:49. [CVDB106413]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alan Tam, Patrick Zircher, Rob Schwager
ComicInfo.Editor: Joe Quesada, Nicole Wiley Boose, Ralph Macchio
ComicInfo.Characters: Apocalypse, Black Box, Cable, Deadpool, Irene Merryweather, Ozymandias, Prester John
ComicInfo.Teams: Commission on Superhuman Activities, Dark Riders
